channel.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – July 2022
item.description: Integrate a React single-page app with the Microsoft identity platform. Enable SSO and get an access token for Microsoft Graph API. Subscribe to MSAL events, protect routes using MSAL Angular Guard, and acquire tokens with MSAL React hooks.

Integrate a React single-page app with the Microsoft identity platform. Enable SSO and get an access token for Microsoft Graph API. Subscribe to MSAL events, protect routes using MSAL Angular Guard, and acquire tokens with MSAL React hooks.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 21st of July, 2022
item.description: Demos: Document automation using Microsoft SharePoint Syntex Content Assembly, Building a conversational tab in a Microsoft Teams app that captures external event conversations, and List formatting tips. Released Microsoft Graph Toolkit – v2.6.0, 8 connectors, 5 script, 1 Teams, 3 Power Platform samples.

Demos: Document automation using Microsoft SharePoint Syntex Content Assembly, Building a conversational tab in a Microsoft Teams app that captures external event conversations, and List formatting tips. Released Microsoft Graph Toolkit – v2.6.0, 8 connectors, 5 script, 1 Teams, 3 Power Platform samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – July 2022
item.description: Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Three demos delivered – Building a SharePoint Document Library Approvals System, Microsoft Teams Approvals in Dynamics 365 using Power Automate, and How to connect Microsoft Dataverse to Microsoft Teams.

Latest Power Platform related news, events and Community Tip. Three demos delivered – Building a SharePoint Document Library Approvals System, Microsoft Teams Approvals in Dynamics 365 using Power Automate, and How to connect Microsoft Dataverse to Microsoft Teams.
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – July 2022
item.description: Action.ToggleVisibility Deprecation (a non-breaking change for a control that needs to support accessibility requirements for all users), Adaptive Cards Handle Responses Connector now GA, React Native Adaptive Cards Renderer next month and 10-minute Q&A.

Action.ToggleVisibility Deprecation (a non-breaking change for a control that needs to support accessibility requirements for all users), Adaptive Cards Handle Responses Connector now GA, React Native Adaptive Cards Renderer next month and 10-minute Q&A.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Creating a SharePoint site using the configuration of another site with PnP Powershell
item.description: Creating a SharePoint site using the configuration of another site with PnP Powershell So… have you ever had the need to copy the configuration of a site you’ve created to another SharePoint site, or make a copy of that site say?

Creating a SharePoint site using the configuration of another site with PnP Powershell So… have you ever had the need to copy the configuration of a site you’ve created to another SharePoint site, or make a copy of that site say?
item.dc:creator: Lewis Baybutt

item.title: Power Query ETL Capabilities
item.description: Garbage in, garbage out. This phrase conveys that incorrect or poor data quality will produce faulty and bad output.
Garbage in, garbage out. This phrase conveys that incorrect or poor data quality will produce faulty and bad output.
item.dc:creator: Ifeanyi Benny Iheagwara

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 14th of July, 2022
item.description: Demos on Upgrading SPFx solutions to the latest version using the CLI for Microsoft 365 and Adaptive Card Extensions - Dynamic Announcements. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI for Microsoft 365, and React Controls. Three web part samples delivered.

Demos on Upgrading SPFx solutions to the latest version using the CLI for Microsoft 365 and Adaptive Card Extensions - Dynamic Announcements. Project releases for PnPjs, CLI for Microsoft 365, and React Controls. Three web part samples delivered.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Community call schedules - July-August 2022
item.description: Weekly Microsoft 365 platform community call is on a break during July-August 2022.
Weekly Microsoft 365 platform community call is on a break during July-August 2022.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: 7 reasons to contribute to the community
item.description: There’s stuff to do, let’s do it together! 7 reasons to start contributing to the community and Open Source.
There’s stuff to do, let’s do it together! 7 reasons to start contributing to the community and Open Source.
item.dc:creator: Martin Lingstuyl

item.title: M365 Development Security - From full trust to ZeroTrust
item.description: This article will showcase typical SharePoint and Microsoft 365 development security patterns. Those patterns can be applied especially in so-called ZeroTrust environments, too, and are linked to step-by-step implementation guidances.

This article will showcase typical SharePoint and Microsoft 365 development security patterns. Those patterns can be applied especially in so-called ZeroTrust environments, too, and are linked to step-by-step implementation guidances.
item.dc:creator: Markus Moeller

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 7th of July, 2022
item.description: Demos - Building Publishing Connectors for MailJet product, Microsoft Graph “Sites.Selected” permissions within SharePoint Online, and Introduction to available open-source list formatting samples from updated list formatting sample portal. Releases from .Net Libraries and PowerShell + 16 scripts/samples.

Demos - Building Publishing Connectors for MailJet product, Microsoft Graph “Sites.Selected” permissions within SharePoint Online, and Introduction to available open-source list formatting samples from updated list formatting sample portal. Releases from .Net Libraries and PowerShell + 16 scripts/samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – June 2022
item.description: Deep dive into how your app can build on Teams SSO and the Microsoft identity platform. We will also discuss how you can connect the Microsoft Identity of a user to your own user store.
Deep dive into how your app can build on Teams SSO and the Microsoft identity platform. We will also discuss how you can connect the Microsoft Identity of a user to your own user store.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 173
item.description: Cloud Developer Advocate at Microsoft - Garry Trinder, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss consulting your way into Microsoft, training challenges and rewards, getting involved in open-source community-work, plus latest 22 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

Cloud Developer Advocate at Microsoft - Garry Trinder, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss consulting your way into Microsoft, training challenges and rewards, getting involved in open-source community-work, plus latest 22 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: How to build a color-contrast-ratio checker for improved accessibility in Power Apps
item.description: tl:dr Color contrast ratio is important for accessibility - here is how to build an in-app checker to build more accessible Power Apps
tl:dr Color contrast ratio is important for accessibility - here is how to build an in-app checker to build more accessible Power Apps
item.dc:creator: Luise Freese

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 30th of June, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building custom accordion Tabs experience with rich text experiences, Using Microsoft Graph Profile API in SPFx for awards web part experience, and Adaptive Cards Extensions strategy pattern for multi-action QuickView. Released Reusable SPFx React Controls v3.8.1 and 2 samples.

Demos: Building custom accordion Tabs experience with rich text experiences, Using Microsoft Graph Profile API in SPFx for awards web part experience, and Adaptive Cards Extensions strategy pattern for multi-action QuickView. Released Reusable SPFx React Controls v3.8.1 and 2 samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: What is a Microsoft 365 Developer, and how to get started
item.description: Since you have found this corner of the internet, chances are that you already have some idea of what a Microsoft 355 Developer does.
Since you have found this corner of the internet, chances are that you already have some idea of what a Microsoft 355 Developer does.

item.title: New Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) team members – June 2022
item.description: We are excited to announce that we are again extending our virtual Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) team with additional community members.
We are excited to announce that we are again extending our virtual Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) team with additional community members.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 28th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Taking advantage of the Microsoft Graph Postman collections, Introduction on the Microsoft Viva Learning extensibility, and Introduction to Virtual Appointment Microsoft Graph API. Delivered 6 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week.

Three demos - Taking advantage of the Microsoft Graph Postman collections, Introduction on the Microsoft Viva Learning extensibility, and Introduction to Virtual Appointment Microsoft Graph API. Delivered 6 articles and 2 video/podcasts this week.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 172
item.description: Architect, Developer, MVP - Beau Cameron (DMI), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss transitioning from SharePoint on-prem to SPO, living in mountain isolation, why use SPFx plus latest 16 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

Architect, Developer, MVP - Beau Cameron (DMI), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss transitioning from SharePoint on-prem to SPO, living in mountain isolation, why use SPFx plus latest 16 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: A collection of resources for Microsoft 365 developers
item.description: Being a Microsoft 365 developer can mean a lot of things.

item.title: Easily Automate a Table in SQL Server Management Studio with Power Automate
item.description: This Step in this blog shows you how to Update a row in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio from the response of a Microsoft Forms using Power Automate
This Step in this blog shows you how to Update a row in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio from the response of a Microsoft Forms using Power Automate

item.title: We love community

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 23rd of June, 2022
item.description: Demos - List Formatting - Tab and Percentage Chart, Tracking activities with Microsoft Lists and Power Automate, and Building your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API + Integrate using Web Components. Yo teams version releases + 9 scripts.

Demos - List Formatting - Tab and Percentage Chart, Tracking activities with Microsoft Lists and Power Automate, and Building your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API + Integrate using Web Components. Yo teams version releases + 9 scripts.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.4
item.description: We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 21st of June, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Using the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK for common operations and Get started with UI Library for Azure Communication Services. Delivered 8 new articles/documents this week. Introduced Microsoft Community Initiative to build a unified Microsoft Cloud Community.
